Class Answer

java.lang.Object
application.Answer
public class Answer extends Object
Represents an answer to a question in the QandA system. Contains information about the answer content, author, and metadata.

  • Constructor Details

    • Answer

      public Answer(int ansID, int qRefID, String bodyText, String answeredBy, Date dateCreated)
      Creates a new Answer with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      ansID - The unique identifier for this answer.
      qRefID - The ID of the question this answer belongs to.
      bodyText - The content of the answer.
      answeredBy - The username of the answer's author.
      dateCreated - The date when the answer was created.
